mapper.select: select p.id, u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, u.user_head_image as userHeadImg, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.collectbar c left join spb.postbarlist p on c.pb_one_id = p.pb_one_id left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is null and c.id > #{id} and c.user_account = #{userAccount} order by p.pb_date desc limit 15
select pb_one_id from spb.collectbar where user_account = #{user_account}
SELECT pb_one_id FROM collectbar WHERE user_account = #{userAccount}
